nginxé…ç½® â€‹

nginxå…¨é…ç½®

nginx

server {
    listen 80;
    listen 443 ssl;
    server_name  www.chat.localhost;
    ssl_certificate /ssl/www.chat.localhost.crt;
    ssl_certificate_key /ssl/www.localhost.key;
    access_log /logs/demo.likeadmin.cnt_access_nginx.log;
    error_log /logs/demo.likeadmin.cn_error_nginx.log;
    client_max_body_size 5M;
    location / {
        root  chat/server/public;#å…¥å£æ–‡ä»¶ç›®å½•
        index  index.html index.htm index.php;
        if (!-e $request_filename)
        {
            rewrite ^/(.*)$ /index.php?s=$1 last;
            break;
        }
    }
    location ~ /.*\.php/ {
        rewrite ^(.*?/?)(.*\.php)(.*)$ /$2?s=$3 last;
        break;
    }
    error_page   500 502 503 504  /50x.html;
    location = /50x.html {
        root   /var/www/html;
    }

    location ~ \.php$ {
        fastcgi_pass   127.0.0.1:9000;
        fastcgi_index  index.php;
        fastcgi_param  SCRIPT_FILENAME  chat/server/public$fastcgi_script_name; #å…¥å£æ–‡ä»¶ç›®å½•
        include        fastcgi_params;
    }
    location = /favicon.ico {
            log_not_found off;
            access_log off;
        }
}
